proposal: Hey Chainlink community, with 124039 holders and counting, your decentralized computing platform is truly a force to reckon with in the crypto world. Imagine enhancing this force with our DEX, Lottery, Wallet, Farming, DAO, Crosschain, and IDOFactory features. These tools could further empower your community, making LINK not just a global standard, but a universal one. See my profile for demo and details.
